Articles.Content:
long distance bomber with anti-aircraft capabilities.

Slow manoeuvring, made up with long distance and high speed capabilities.

small manoeuvres above 12km

Top speed: 2000 M/s+ at 15Km+

maximum stable height: <30 km

range: 150km+ at over 15Km, 50Km at under 5KM

Weapons: 7 Railguns with 4 shells each; 10 unguided bombs.

future variations will appear soon...

parts required are as follows:

C7 aviation pack, Silsko edition, dumb bomb from the gravity bomb mod, the devastator railgun from JellyCubes weaponry
Either bad photo editing or intended miniscule sneak-peek.

Either bad photo editing or intended miniscule sneak-peek.

yeah its pretty much both of those.
